Very active player base and a huge variety of killers. It is a game that can induce massive amounts of salt, but the majority of the player base takes it on the chin. It's constantly being balanced and updated as well. There is a lot of love poored into it from the devs, and it's definitely worth the full price of admission.

Dead by daylight est vraiment un bon jeu, mais qui n'est pas adapté à tous. Si vous êtes de nature à rager facilement, ne vous lancer pas dans ce jeu. Tout le principe consiste à être une raclure avec l'équipe d'en face pour assurer sa victoire. Pas de pitié à avoir, il faut user de tous ce que vous connaissez, et de votre expérience pour assurer votre survie.
Si vous n'avez pas peur de vous confronter à la défaite, ce jeu est fait pour vous.
C'est un jeu qui se joue tout aussi bien seul, que à 4 ou 5 (même s'il brise plus d'amitié que Mario Kart en privé).
Attention, le jeu peut manquer d'équilibrage par moment malheureusement mais cela ne lui retire pas le plaisir que vous pourrez acquérir lorsque vous aurez semer l'assassin !
Excelente! Apesar dos killers campers que estragam a diversão, vale a pena cada centava investido.

Have you ever wanted to be a 90 pound teenage girl capable of going toe-to-toe with an 8-foot tall machete-weilding madman? WELL THIS IS THE GAME FOR YOU! With incredibly strong "Helpless survivors" and depowered "killers," this game offers thousands of hours of potential to troll the crap out of the person unfortunate enough to play the "stronger role." If there's ever a killer that proves too strong for you, WORRY NOT! The devs have your back, my dear survivors, and will nerf any killer who makes you have to actually think to beat into oblivion. 

Realtalk, tho, despite being heavily survivor-favored, this game offers countelss hours of fun. You'll laugh. You'll cry. You'll need laser eye surgery after staring at a white screen because FLASHLIGHTS are a thing. Eventually you'll probably throw your PC out of your window. You'll still come back for more. This is the most addictive rage-game I've ever played.

-----------------

Coming back to this review. Since I posted this, the developers have made a LOT of changes that have made the game actually balanced. It's going to be really, really tough on new survivors because playing survivor actually takes SKILL now. You really have to outhink the killer instead of brainlessly running pallet to pallet. Take heart, baby survivors, the survivor side is still strong enough that no killer (With the possible exception of a really good Nurse) should seem straight-up overpowered.

My point here is: Being a killer doesn't feel like a chore anymore and survivor actually have to pay attention to what they're doing to have any hope of winning.

Игра, которая заслуживает вашего внимания, времени, при условии, что вы любите пощекотать себе нервы, будучи жертвой маньяков или ощущать властность и силу над слабыми или сильными выжившими, а много на ваш выбор, и тех и других. У игры есть свои изъяны и преимущества, но это не мешает получать удовольствие и новые ощущения с теми людьми, кто играет в неё вместе с тобой.
